Just a quick note to let you know that we’ve received your request and are already working on it.

We’ll provide you with an update by tomorrow.

Thanks for the quick turnaround - really appreciated!!

We've worked hard to bring you a wide range of premium fixtures at affordable prices. Create your dream home without breaking the bank at KODILO. Shop now.

Action 3 - Add alder as a logo under partners - logo attached

Sarah

full_threads.body:
Hi all

I have attached product updates required for Kodilo.

  • 2nd tab shows 900+ product lines to be removed. Some have already been removed when Heath deleted Seima and this clarifies the complete list to ensure all products have been removed. Includes some obsolete product from Alder
  • 1st tab shows Alder product (some extra products to be removed) and
    • Sales price
    • Normal price RRP incl GST
    • Qty of items in stock to sell at sale
  • Discounts of 60% for most (some at 30%)
  • Red font in single cells is data that has been corrected
  • Entire lines marked in red are to be removed and marked as such
Please action and upload to Kodilo.

Thanks

Sarah
